questions.question: What services does ABSOLUTE SARL offer?
questions.answer:
ABSOLUTE SARL offers a complete range of professional services:

‚Ä¢ Immigration (Canada, Belgium, France)
‚Ä¢ Digital marketing and communication strategy
‚Ä¢ Graphic design and visual identity
‚Ä¢ E-secretariat and administrative assistance
‚Ä¢ General commerce

We are your multi-service partner for your professional and personal projects.

questions.question: Do you help with immigration to Canada?
questions.answer:
Yes, absolutely! We assist our clients with their Canadian immigration procedures for:

‚Ä¢ Permanent residence (all programs)
‚Ä¢ Study visas
‚Ä¢ Professional and academic guidance
‚Ä¢ Complete file preparation
‚Ä¢ Follow-up until submission and beyond

Our specialized team guides you through every step of the process.

questions.question: Do you help with immigration to Belgium?
questions.answer:
Yes, we specialize in support for studies in Belgium:

‚Ä¢ Choice of universities and programs
‚Ä¢ Complete admission file
‚Ä¢ Student visa preparation
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive administrative assistance
‚Ä¢ Personalized follow-up until your departure

We help you realize your study project in Europe with complete peace of mind.

questions.question: Do you offer services for France?
questions.answer:
Yes, we support students with their study project in France:

‚Ä¢ Personalized academic guidance
‚Ä¢ Choice of institutions and programs
‚Ä¢ Campus France file preparation
‚Ä¢ Student visa preparation
‚Ä¢ Support until visa approval

Our expertise ensures a solid and professional application.

questions.question: Do you guarantee visa approval?
questions.answer:
No, we cannot guarantee visa approval as the final decision belongs to consular and immigration authorities.

However, we do everything possible to maximize your chances of success:

‚Ä¢ In-depth profile analysis
‚Ä¢ Complete and compliant file preparation
‚Ä¢ Optimal interview preparation
‚Ä¢ Rigorous follow-up of all stages
‚Ä¢ Expertise based on our field experience

Our commitment: professional and transparent support.

questions.question: Where are you physically located?
questions.answer:
Our headquarters is located in Douala, Cameroon:

üìç Address: Cit√© des Palmiers, near Coll√®ge Dauphine
Yellow Building - 2nd Floor - Office B09
Douala - Cameroon

üìû Phones:
‚Ä¢ Main: +237 699 99 28 18
‚Ä¢ Secondary: +237 675 15 78 71

üïí Hours:
‚Ä¢ Monday - Friday: 08:00 - 17:00
‚Ä¢ Saturday: 08:00 - 15:00

We are happy to welcome you to discuss your projects!

questions.question: Do you work entirely remotely?
questions.answer:
Yes, we offer 100% online support for all our services!

‚úÖ Remote work advantages:
‚Ä¢ Video consultations
‚Ä¢ Secure document sending
‚Ä¢ Real-time file tracking
‚Ä¢ Constant communication (email, WhatsApp, phone)
‚Ä¢ Flexibility and time savings

Whether you are in Cameroon, Africa or elsewhere in the world, we support you effectively.

questions.question: What are your processing times?
questions.answer:
Processing times vary by service type:

‚è±Ô∏è Digital services & Graphic design: 1 to 7 days
‚è±Ô∏è E-secretariat: Immediate to 3 days
‚è±Ô∏è Immigration (Canada, Belgium, France): 6 to 12 months
‚è±Ô∏è General commerce: Depending on availability

We provide you with a precise schedule from the beginning of our collaboration. Our priority: meeting deadlines while maintaining quality.

questions.question: Can I pay in installments?
questions.answer:
Yes, we offer payment facilities for most of our services!

üí≥ Installment payment options:
‚Ä¢ Payment in 2, 3 or 4 installments depending on the service
‚Ä¢ Personalized payment schedule
‚Ä¢ Transparent and clear conditions

üí∞ Accepted payment methods:
‚Ä¢ Bank transfer
‚Ä¢ Mobile Money (MTN, Orange)
‚Ä¢ Cash (at the office)

Contact us to establish a payment plan adapted to your budget.

questions.question: Do you have dedicated advisors for each service?
questions.answer:
Yes, each domain is managed by dedicated experts:

üë®‚Äçüíº Canada Immigration: Dilane Kamto
üë®‚Äçüíº Europe Immigration: Mike Tchabet
üë©‚Äçüíº Digital Services: Adeline Ntouko
üë®‚Äçüíº General Management: Jordan Ntouko

Each advisor has in-depth expertise in their field and personally supports you throughout your project.

questions.question: Do you offer free quotes?
questions.answer:
Yes, all our quotes are free and without obligation!

üìã Our process:
1. Initial contact (phone, email, WhatsApp)
2. Free needs assessment
3. Detailed and personalized quote
4. Presentation of options and terms
5. No obligation on your part

We believe in total transparency. You know the exact price before committing.

questions.question: What are the prerequisites for Canadian immigration?
questions.answer:
The basic documents to start your Canada file:

üìÑ Essential documents:
‚Ä¢ Valid passport
‚Ä¢ Detailed CV
‚Ä¢ Diplomas and transcripts
‚Ä¢ Employment certificates
‚Ä¢ Identity documents
‚Ä¢ Recent passport photos

Other specific documents may be required depending on your profile and chosen program. We guide you to build a complete file.

questions.question: Do you offer digital marketing services?
questions.answer:
Yes, we offer a complete range of digital services:

üéØ Digital Marketing:
‚Ä¢ Professional community management
‚Ä¢ Facebook Ads & Google Ads
‚Ä¢ Digital communication strategy
‚Ä¢ Engaging content creation
‚Ä¢ Social media management

üé® Graphic Design:
‚Ä¢ Visual identity creation
‚Ä¢ Professional logo design
‚Ä¢ Flyers, posters, brochures
‚Ä¢ Corporate materials

Boost your online presence with our expertise!

questions.question: What is the E-secretariat service?
questions.answer:
Our E-secretariat service frees you from administrative tasks:

üìù Included services:
‚Ä¢ Professional writing (letters, reports)
‚Ä¢ Agenda and appointment management
‚Ä¢ Document entry and formatting
‚Ä¢ Complete administrative support
‚Ä¢ Flexible remote assistance

Ideal for entrepreneurs, SMEs and professionals who want to focus on their core business.

questions.question: What is your cancellation policy?
questions.answer:
Our cancellation policy is clear and fair:

‚úÖ Cancellation possible before service starts
‚úÖ Specific conditions depending on service type
‚úÖ Partial or full refund depending on progress
‚úÖ Total transparency on terms

We discuss these conditions from contract signing to avoid any confusion.

questions.question: Do you offer guarantees on your services?
questions.answer:
Yes, we commit to several guarantees:

üõ°Ô∏è Our guarantees:
‚Ä¢ Professional service quality
‚Ä¢ Absolute data confidentiality
‚Ä¢ Continuous support and regular follow-up
‚Ä¢ Transparency on processes and pricing
‚Ä¢ Availability and responsiveness of our team

Your satisfaction is our absolute priority.

questions.question: How does the ordering process work?
questions.answer:
Our process is simple and structured in 5 steps:

1Ô∏è‚É£ CONTACT: Initial contact by phone, email or WhatsApp
2Ô∏è‚É£ DIAGNOSTIC: Free analysis of your needs and profile
3Ô∏è‚É£ QUOTE: Detailed and personalized proposal
4Ô∏è‚É£ PAYMENT: Contract signing and payment according to terms
5Ô∏è‚É£ EXECUTION: Project start and follow-up until completion

We support you at every step with transparency.

questions.question: What is your target audience?
questions.answer:
We support a diverse clientele:

üë• Client profiles:
‚Ä¢ Students (18-30 years)

üåç Geographic areas:

questions.question: Do you offer online training?
questions.answer:
This is a project in development!

üéì Training coming soon:
‚Ä¢ Immigration procedures preparation
‚Ä¢ Digital marketing for entrepreneurs

‚Ä¢ Thematic workshops and webinars

Sign up for our newsletter to be informed of our training launch.

questions.question: How do you differentiate yourself from competitors?
questions.answer:
ABSOLUTE SARL stands out through several key elements:

‚≠ê Our differentiation:
‚Ä¢ 100% personalized and human approach
‚Ä¢ Real and progressive file tracking
‚Ä¢ Proven field expertise
‚Ä¢ Integrated multi-services (time savings)
‚Ä¢ Permanent availability and responsiveness
‚Ä¢ Total transparency on processes
‚Ä¢ Dedicated team of specialized experts

We are not just a service provider, we are your trusted partner.

questions.question: What are your opening hours?

We are available all week:

‚Ä¢ Monday - Friday: 08:00 - 17:00

We remain flexible to adapt to your schedule.

questions.question: How much do your services cost?
questions.answer:
Our rates are established on a custom basis according to your needs:

üí∞ Pricing:
‚Ä¢ Free personalized quote

Contact us for a precise estimate adapted to your project.

questions.question: Do you work with international partners?

Yes, we actively develop our network of partners:

Our network is constantly growing to better serve you.

Absolutely! Transparency and follow-up are our priorities:

You are never left in the dark. We keep you informed at every important step.
